editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It’s one thing to say you’d never take a bribe: It’s quite another when your options are taking one or missing rent or going hungry. That’s but a taste of the moral quandaries in Papers, Please, which puts you in the shoes of a border checkpoint agent in a fictional 1980s nation. Learning to master passport processing skills, avoiding fines, and making the most of your paycheck is uniquely satisfying and provocative in a way few games manage to achieve. This celebrated indie gem teaches us as much about empathy as it does time management.

name: A Little to the Left: Drawers

editorialNotes.short: Charge up the classic for your phone.

editorialNotes.standard: Cool reaction emoji! Strategy-smashing Nope cards! The fur truly flies in this slick adaptation of the zany card game.

editorialNotes.standard: Great balls of fire! It’s enormously fun playing as mages in this fast-paced, pixel-art roguelike.
Form smart alliances to keep the spice flowing in this superb digital re-imagining of the popular board game.

This brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful world – a world that keeps growing with new areas to explore and characters to meet.
editorialNotes.short: Search for hidden people and objects in detailed, hand-drawn landscapes.

editorialNotes.standard: This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

editorialNotes.standard: Catchy music, incredible combo-filled combat, co-op play and a blast of nostalgic spirit ensures this classic brawling series still packs a punch.

editorialNotes.standard: Mash through waves of foes as a heavily armed potato in this spud-tacular arena survival game.

editorialNotes.standard: Mullets, malls and flying bikes? We had a rad time spotting nods to the ’80s while defending a camp from monsters in this 2D strategy game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: A delight to explore, brimming with surprises ranging from sarcastic vending machines to nightmarish bosses, we’re still finding new paths, new choices and unexpected encounters that make us laugh.

When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you don’t have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, it’s a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldn’t wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beauty—and this sequel didn’t let us down. With its striking colours and level design, it’s even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what we’ll remember most, though—their relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

editorialNotes.standard: A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenes—some from previous Hitman games—as a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.standard: For builders and tinkerers, the planet Woanope couldn’t be a better place to be stranded. It’s overflowing with flowers, crystals, animals and a zillion other resources you can quickly craft into everything from comfy furniture to vicious weapons. A never-ending string of new locations and inventions keeps this survival RPG engrossing, and its oddball humour pulls you in even more. We looked forward to every wacky conversation with our robo-companion and random alien creatures—and to the awesome discoveries we’d make when they sent us on quests.
editorialNotes.short: Fight monsters. Chop down trees. Build new things. It's a survivalist's delight.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: THE GAME OF LIFE: Road Trip

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little “boo” in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

name: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game
